selected_quotes: mcr-1 and blaKPC-3 in Escherichia coli Sequence Type 744 after Meropenem and Colistin Therapy, Portugal.
Emerging E. coli co-resistance to carbapenems and polymyxins after therapy with drugs from both classes
It's amazing how quickly bacteria can adapt to be #AMR.
mcr-1 and blaKPC-3 in E. coli ST744 after Meropenem and Colistin Therapy, Portugal #EIDjournal #AMR

citation.abstract: Escherichia coli Ec36 was recovered from a patient in Portugal after treatment with meropenem and colistin. Besides an IncF plasmid with Tn1441d-blaKPC-3, already reported in clinical strains in this country, E. coli Ec36 co-harbored an IncX4::mcr-1 gene. Results highlight emerging co-resistance to carbapenems and polymyxins after therapy with drugs from both classes.
citation.publisher: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC)
